SELECT cg.cgid cgid, cg.cgdan cgdan, cg.cgshentime cgshentime, cg.cgcorporate cgcorporate, cg.cgaddress cgaddress, cg.cgchuku cgchuku, cg.cgallmoney cgallmoney, yg.ygname ygname FROM `caigou` cg INNER JOIN `yuangong` yg ON cg.ygid=yg.ygid
and cg.cgdan like concat('%',#{cgdan},'%')
and cg.cgchuku='ck001' and cg.cgruku='rk001'

SELECT cgdt.cdcoun cdcoun, gys.gfaname gfaname, gys.gphone gphone, gys.gzhutitype gzhutitype, gys.gaddre gaddre, gys.gname gname, gys.gyingyeimg gyingyeimg, gysp.gsid gsid, gysp.gsname gsname, gysp.gsprice gsprice, gysp.gsmiaoshu gsmiaoshu, gysp.gsimg gsimg, gysp.gsbozhi gsbozhi, gysp.gschandi gschandi FROM caigou cg INNER JOIN caigoudtis cgdt ON cg.cgid=cgdt.cgid INNER JOIN gongyingshop gysp ON cgdt.gsid=gysp.gsid INNER JOIN gongyingshang gys ON gysp.gid=gys.gid WHERE cg.cgid= #{cgid} AND cg.cgghszhuangtai= 'cg001' AND cg.cgchuku='ck001' AND cgdt.cdzhuangtai='cd001'

SELECT cg.cgid cgid, cg.cgdan cgdan, ckrk.ckshenhetime ckshenhetime, ckrk.ckzhuangtai ckzhuangtai, cg.cgcorporate cgcorporate, cg.cgaddress cgaddress, cg.cgchuku cgchuku, cg.cgallmoney cgallmoney, yg.ygname ygname FROM `cangkuruku` ckrk INNER JOIN shopcangku ck ON ckrk.scid=ck.scid INNER JOIN caigou cg ON cg.cgdan=ckrk.ckdan INNER JOIN `yuangong` yg ON cg.ygid=yg.ygid
and cg.cgdan like concat('%',#{cgdan},'%')
